task.title: Flushing the Radiator System
task.shortdesc: Periodically flush the circulating system to maintain proper cooling function.

context.p: The cooling system requires occasional thorough flushing to maintain optimal performance.

substep.cmd: Insert water at normal pressure into the filler neck
Allow water to flow through the tubes
Let water drain through the drain cock and hose
Insert water into the cylinder head connection
Allow water to flow through the water jackets
Let water drain through the side inlet connection

result.p: The cooling system will be clear of buildup and debris, allowing for optimal circulation.
